heading: Puzzles Management
title: Basic Chess Puzzle
description: A brief explanation of the puzzle's objective.

steps.title: Analyze the Position
steps.description: Examine the positions of the pieces, paying special attention to the King.

steps.title: Identify the Key Idea
steps.description: Look for a common tactic or plan that can help you solve the puzzle.

steps.title: Calculate Variations
steps.description: Once you have an idea, calculate possible moves and the consequences of each move.

steps.title: Test and Adjust
steps.description: After calculating variations, check if your tactic works in all cases.

steps.title: Explain the Moves
steps.description: Write down each move in your solution and explain the reasoning behind each move.
